description: This Python source file is part of a JSON-RPC code generation utility, containing functions to create headers, classes, enums, and stub code for JSON-RPC APIs based on provided schemas. It orchestrates code generation, manages file updates, and logs operations.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file defining the JSON-RPC API interfaces based on provided headers list, writing include directives and comments.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function that parses the schema and generates various parts of JSON-RPC code including classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC implementations, managing up-to-date checks and conditional generation.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
